articles.author: By Andrew McMurtry of news.com.au
articles.title: Bikini drama overshadows beach handball European Championships - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: Controversy has rocked the European Beach Handball Championships.
articles.content: The image that kicked off the firestorm. Photo / TwitterControversy has rocked the European Beach Handball Championships after the Norwegian side said it was threatened with disqualification from the… [+4027 chars]
